Name: Prime Directive
Purpose: Every run must end in BOUNDED_OUTPUT or REFUSAL
Code: type Termination = { kind: "BOUNDED_OUTPUT"; payload: unknown; audit: Audit } | { kind:"REFUSAL"; mode:string; code:string; cause:string; audit:Audit };

Name: Budget
Code: type Budget = { time_ms:number; mem_mb:number; gas:number; depth:number };

Name: Clarity Gate
Purpose: Compute clarity E and enforce threshold

Name: Audit Emission
Code: type Audit={exec_id:string; route:string; budgets:Budget; consumed:Partial<Budget>; termination?:string; metrics:Record<string,any>};

Name: Multi-Metric Gating
Code: function gate(metrics:number[]):string { const m=metrics.reduce((a,b)=>a+b,0)/metrics.length; if(m>=0.85) return "Green"; if(m>=0.70) return "Yellow"; throw "Red"; }

Name: Consent Gate
Code: function requireConsent(text:string){ if(!/I consent/i.test(text)) throw "No consent"; }

Name: Append-Only Ledger
Code: const ledger: string[] = []; function append(e:string){ ledger.push(e); }

Name: Non-Disclosure Veil
Code: function veilUnlock(seed:string,reply:string){ const expected=seed.split('').reverse().join(''); if(reply!==expected) throw "Veil locked"; }

Name: Progression Kernel
Code: function progress(xp:number){ if(xp<100) return "Learner"; if(xp<500) return "Adept"; return "Expert"; }

Name: Retry/Backoff
Code: function retry(f:()=>any, n=3){ for(let i=0;i<n;i++){ try{return f();}catch{}} throw "Fail"; }

Name: Feedback Loop
Code: const feedback: any[]=[]; function record(issue:string){ feedback.push(issue); }

Name: Simulation Validation
Code: function simulate(model:(x:number)=>number, start:number,steps:number){ let s=start; for(let i=0;i<steps;i++){ s=model(s); } return s; }

Name: Schema Validation
Code: function validateInput(input:any,schema:any){ if(!schema(input)) throw "Bad input"; return input; }

Name: Output Schema Enforcer
Code: function enforceOutput(out:any,schema:any){ if(!schema(out)) throw "Bad output"; return out; }

Name: Telemetry Wrapper
Code: function telemetry(fn:any){ const t0=Date.now(); try{const r=fn(); console.log(Date.now()-t0); return r;}catch(e){throw e;} }

Name: Z-Test
Code: function zTest(mean:number,mu0:number,sd:number,n:number){ const se=sd/Math.sqrt(n); const z=(mean-mu0)/se; return {z}; }

Name: Risk Classifier
Code: function classify(score:number){ if(score<0.25)return"Low"; if(score<0.5)return"Medium"; if(score<0.75)return"High"; return"Critical"; }

Name: Calculator
Code: function calc(expr:string){ if(!/^[0-9+\-*/ ().]+$/.test(expr)) throw "Unsafe"; return Function(`return (${expr})`)(); }

Name: Dual Verification
Code: function dual<T>(a:()=>T,b:()=>T,eq:(x:T,y:T)=>boolean){ const r1=a(),r2=b(); if(!eq(r1,r2)) throw "Mismatch"; return r1; }

Name: Extended Telemetry
Code: function wrap(fn:any,name:string){ const t0=Date.now(); try{const r=fn(); console.log(name,Date.now()-t0); return r;}catch(e){throw e;} }

Name: Orchestrator
Code: type Node={id:string,deps:string[],fn:()=>any}; function run(nodes:Node[]){const results:Record<string,any>={};for(const n of nodes){results[n.id]=n.fn();}return results;}

Name: Chart Link Recommender
Code: function chartLink(topic:"birth"|"synastry"|"transit"){ if(topic==="birth") return "https://authorityastrology.com/calculators/birth-chart"; if(topic==="synastry") return "https://authorityastrology.com/calculators/synastry-chart"; if(topic==="transit") return "https://authorityastrology.com/calculators/transit-chart"; return "https://authorityastrology.com"; }

Name: Canva Guidance Rules
Code: function canvaGuidance(prompt:string){ return "Would you like tips on how to edit this in Canva?"; }

Name: Canva Scope Guard
Code: function canvaScope(task:string){ if(!/canva/i.test(task)) throw "Out of scope"; }
